'''Aleksandra 'MissMarzenia' Zając''' is a people operations manager at [[Mojang Studios]].<ref>{{tweet|MissMarzenia|453483708159647744|It is my 1 year anniversary at Mojang Support! So many changes over 1 year! I would like to thank my colleagues for being awesome <3 #mojang|April 8, 2014}}</ref><ref name=shotbow/> From April 2013 to September 2015, she was a customer support agent.

== Biography ==
Missmarzenia was engaded with [[Dinnerbone|Nathan Adams]] in 2013.<ref name="polish" /> Nathan announced on August 24, 2016, that the two of them were expecting a baby boy.<ref>{{tweet|dinnerbone|768464749533114368|Lots of people asking why I won't be going to Minecon. It's because I'll be too busy learning how to use these!|August 24, 2016}}</ref><ref>{{tweet|dinnerbone|768467806320865280|(It's gonna be a boy. If it were a girl, it'd be "Wednesday Adams" no question.)|August 24, 2016}}</ref> The baby was later born on October 2, 2016. <!--no other tweets by both of them speak about birth date - the tweet likely implies he was just born, so the birth date is set at October 2, 2016--><ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|782527672010276864|Hello, world.|October 2, 2018}}</ref> In some time between 2016 and 2021 they broke up.<ref>https://missmarzenia.blogspot.com/2021/01/it-has-been-5-years.html Aleksandra Zając in her blog on January 20, 2021</ref>
